attributes.action: remove an infestation of fleas from cowbridge comprehensive school in wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a petition to get rid of an infestation of fleas that our school cannot afford to rid itself of. there are no plans being made at this time to do anything about this problem.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
